titulo: Funny Tales in Easy Spanish Volume 2: El Hospital Loco
descripcion:
This new volume of our best-selling series, Funny Tales in Easy Spanish, was written in simple, easy Spanish for advanced-beginning and intermediate level students. Fun and easy to follow, all the jokes contained in this audiobook were edited and simplified to ease your language comprehension and practice, using simple wording, short sentences, and moderate vocabulary.
Practice your Spanish the fun and easy way, and have a great time listening to this hilarious audiobook today!
